name: Kairish
textInChatBox: We started in the 10s lived the 20s...
text2: and now another decade together starts 🥹
text3: I could just say happy birthday blablabla 😮‍💨
text4: But since you are great, I wanted to do something.
text5Content: You are Special and I love you. 💓
replayText: Just click here, and watch it all over again.
